cn.trackCensoredName: VidHub - 高清影片视频播放器，快速播放云盘网盘
cn.artistName: Nanjing Oumi Software Development Co., Ltd.
cn.trackName: VidHub - 高清影片视频播放器，快速播放云盘网盘
cn.sellerName: Nanjing Oumi Software Development Co., Ltd.
cn.description:
当您需要一个功能完备的媒体播放器来管理、组织和播放各种类型的视频时，VidHub会满足您的需求！VidHub是一款广受欢迎的媒体播放器，不仅能够播放各种不同格式的视频，，同时，VidHub内置各种媒体库管理、网络共享等功能，提供快速、稳定的视频播放，带来非凡的用户体验。
VidHub的主要功能包括：
- 支持iOS、Mac、Apple TV平台，通过iCloud实现数据同步
- 广泛的视频格式支持 - VidHub能够播放各种格式的视频，包括.mkv、.avi、.mp4、.mov、.rmvb、.wmv等等。让您在一款播放器中体验多样的视频内容。
- 高品质视频播放 - VidHub支持高清、 4K、 HDR 等各种视频，呈现出流畅清晰的视频观感。
- 字幕支持 - VidHub支持视频内置字幕，并可以挂载多种外置字幕格式，例如SRT,SSA,SUB，并支持字幕调整功能。用户可以根据需要开启或关闭字幕，获得良好的观看体验。
- 网络共享媒体库 - VidHub支持访问多种网络共享协议，包括 SMB/CIFS，WebDav，也支持访问云端视频文件，例如Dropbox, Google Drive， OneDrive，百度网盘，阿里云盘, 移动云盘, 115 盘，天翼云盘。方便您轻松访问云端视频和其他WebDav服务器上的媒体库。
- 支持下载、删除云端文件
- 支持重命名云端文件，支持添加字符、替换字符、正则表达式重命名方式
- 支持直连Emby、Jellyfin、Plex媒体库 - 连上即可播放，无需再为追剧看片烦恼。
- 方便的文件管理 - VidHub有自己的媒体库管理器，并支持用美观简洁的界面展示视频的清单。用户可以按照类型、日期、分级、评分等分类，快速找到需要的媒体文件。

总的来说，VidHub是一款功能丰富的媒体播放器，能够管理、组织和播放各种媒体文件。VidHub会让您的视频播放更加愉悦，让您获得高质量的观看体验。

注意：影片资料和封面是由 TMDB 提供，TMDB 是一个由网络社区维护的电影和电视节目免费数据库。

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
https://zh.okaapps.com/privacy_vidhub
https://zh.okaapps.com/terms_vidhub

If you enjoy using our logo maker app, please write a positive review because without your support we don't exist!
cn.description:
在iPhone、iPad或iPod Touch用InstaLogo设计新logo，全新设计并支持Apple Watch，随时随地制作漂亮的logo和设计。

*****

InstaLogo可将你的iOS设备变成logo设计工具，数分钟即可设计出logo、传单、邀请函等等。然后可通过邮件、上传到Dropbox、Evernote及Box与朋友和同事分享，也可保存到iOS设备或发送打印。一切从未如此简单。

下面是我们的一些客户对InstaLogo的评价:

“非常好用，下载时没想到有这么好用，现在简直爱不释手” - Benjtee

“绝对值得收藏，以前付了很多钱请设计师，早发现这款应用就好了.... ” - christofim

“这是我发现的最好用的logo设计App，5星好评！！” - Dragoman7

“非常不错的一款App，简单、好玩、实用！干的不错！” - IrocOn1

*****

这款App Store上最受欢迎的logo设计app让你可以:

创建漂亮的Logo
-	海量logo库可选
-	从照片库导入照片
-	可选大量字体，或导入自己的字体
-	复制并粘贴文本、图片等到应用内
-	缩放、拖动及旋转你的logo元素来调整大小和视角

调整和修改现有Logo
-	更改logo的渐变和色彩、文本及背景
-	添加专业级阴影
-	使用网格线完美对齐
-	按度数精确调整元素角度

修复错误
-	撤销和重做每一步
-	轻松删除logo任一部分或全删
-	使用套索工具来回移动对象

尽情发挥创造力
-	用手指或手写笔绘画，现在还支持3D Touch
-	从Apple Watch上的新调色板应用选取颜色
-	支持iPad Pro和Apple Pencil，让你的创造力尽情挥洒

分享和保存Logo
-	透明背景保存，非常适合日常使用
-	上传图片到Dropbox、Evernote及Box，安全并可分享
-	通过邮件分享logo或直接上传到Facebook

*****

功能列表

-	可在iPhone、iPad及iPod touch上使用
-	支持iPad Pro、Apple Pencil及Apple Watch
-	iPad Air 2及更高版本支持多任务
-	iPhone 6s、6s Plus、7及7 Plus支持3D Touch
-	支持横向和纵向
-	超过50,000个logo组合
-	超过270个手选拉丁和非拉丁字体 
-	从照片库导入自己的图片
-	移动、调整大小、旋转、翻转及微移对象
-	用图片填充文本和logo
-	为文本添加自定义边框
-	调整文本间距和弧度
-	专业RGB/HSB/Hex拾色器
-	收藏调色板
-	画布和照片裁剪
-	调整每个对象的不透明度
-	智能辅助线
-	专业阴影编辑器
-	完整撤销和重做
-	支持手指和手写笔
-	橡皮工具
-	套索工具
-	支持透明PNG
-	支持AirPrint
-	使用Google Drive、Box、Dropbox及Evernote分享
-	通过邮件和Facebook分享
-	支持29种语言

*****
部分功能需要应用内购买。

订阅价格及条款

订阅专业版可无限制访问我们的优质内容和功能。

- 免费试用订阅是自动续订的，除非在续订之前24小时取消。                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
- 免费试用期(如有提供)任何未使用的部分将在用户购买订阅后作废(如适用)。
- 用户可以管理订阅，购买后转到用户的帐户设置可关闭自动续订，订阅期任何未使用部分将不提供退款。
- 在用户确认购买后，付款将从用户的iTunes账户收取。
- 将在当前订阅期结束前24小时内确认续订费用并从帐户收取。
- 这些价格是针对美国客户的。在其他国家的定价可能会有所不同，实际费用会换算成你所在国家的货币。

可以在这里阅读使用条款和隐私政策:
http://instalogocreator.com/terms
http://instalogocreator.com/privacy

获取24/7支持
如有问题、意见及支持请求，请发送邮件至support@instalogocreator.com。

马上下载InstaLogo Logo创建器！

cn.releaseNotes:
• Start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button
• Integrate with the Shortcuts app to automate workflow (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app)
• Trigger Shortcuts automatically on specific events in Be Focused
• Multiple fixes and improvements
cn.description:
专注于任务，对我们这个离不开屏幕的时代来说是一项真正的挑战。Be Focused 通过将任务分解为若干个间隔，中间穿插短暂休息，帮助您完成工作。这是一种令人惊讶的有效方法，可以保持动力和专注。创建任务，设置休息时间，并在一天、每周或自定义周期内跟踪您的进度。您可以在 iPhone、iPad 或 Mac 上使用 Be Focused — 所有内容都能完美同步。

任务管理

•	创建和管理任务
•	为任务添加备注和截止日期
•	使用标签和筛选器组织任务
•	从其他应用粘贴任务列表

计时器控制

•	启动、暂停或跳过间隔
•	可选自动开始下一个间隔
•	规划完成任务所需的间隔并跟踪准确性
•	管理已完成的间隔

计时器自定义

•	设置工作时段、短休息和长休息的持续时间
•	定义长休息前的间隔数量
•	设置每日目标间隔数
•	为各个任务分配不同的计时器设置

报告

•	查看详细报告以监控您的进度
•	将数据导出为 CSV 格式

声音与通知

•	可调节频率的计时器滴答声
•	多种警报声音
•	交互式通知
•	可调节的警报和计时器音量

集成

•	在所有设备间同步（iPhone、iPad、Mac）*
•	与 Focus Matrix 集成，使用紧急/重要原则管理任务 **
•	与快捷指令 App 集成，实现工作流程自动化

快速访问

•	锁定屏幕和主屏幕的小组件
•	锁定屏幕和动态岛的实时活动
•	可从锁定屏幕、控制中心或操作按钮启动或停止计时器

自动化

•	与快捷指令应用集成（通过快捷指令应用控制任务和计时器）
•	在 Be Focused 应用中基于事件自动执行快捷指令

设备支持

•	支持 Apple Watch
•	也适用于 Mac
•	支持深色和浅色模式

* 与 Mac 同步需要安装 macOS 版本的 Be Focused Pro（单独销售）。
** 与Focus Matrix集成需要Pro版本的Focus Matrix，需单独购买。

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的色情内容或裸露
cn.releaseNotes:
- 歌曲包「Tanchiky 精选集」现已推出
- 歌曲包「NOISZ SL + PK GODHAND 联动」现已推出
- 复刻活动限时开启，歌曲「Flashdance」、驾驶员「荷珀+伊洛 -Re：End-」以及限定头像等众多奖励。
- 新增1首基础歌曲「Sakura rain」
- 允许放大明信片后拖动
- 修复了一些bug
cn.description:
《旋转音律》是一款活用了手机陀螺仪功能的体感音乐游戏。力求带来前所未有的崭新音乐游戏体验。
旋转手机，感受在星河间穿梭的快感。带上耳机，共赴鼓点与星光相伴的宇宙之旅。

=用体感，玩音乐=
不同于传统音游的点按式判定，在《旋转音律》中，你需要通过快速旋转手机来完成部分音符的判定——就像驾驶赛车穿越急弯那样。这将会是如同街机般爽快的音乐游戏体验。

=风格多变的音乐曲目=
众多音游知名曲师参与供稿并提供独家曲目！节奏电音、JPOP、西方歌剧、韩文流行、重金摇滚，风格多样不单调。更有丰富新曲目定期加入游戏曲库。

=梦与约定之地，爱与成长之旅=
跟随伊洛踏上宇宙之旅，追寻友人的足迹，邂逅不同星球的居民，拯救阿古亚星的命运。一路见证伊洛的成长吧！

问题反馈：rotaeno@xd.com

hk.trackName: Be Focused Pro – 專工作學習番茄計時器
hk.releaseNotes:
• Start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button
• Integrate with the Shortcuts app to automate workflow (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app)
• Trigger Shortcuts automatically on specific events in Be Focused
• Multiple fixes and improvements
hk.description:
專注於任務對於我們這個綁定於螢幕的世代來說是一項真正的挑戰。Be Focused 透過將單個任務分解為不同的時間間隔，並由短暫的休息時間分隔，協助您完成工作。這是一種令人驚訝的有效方法，可保持動力和專注。建立任務、配置休息時間，並在一天、一週或自訂期間內追蹤您的進度。您可以在 iPhone、iPad 或 Mac 上使用 Be Focused — 所有內容都能完美同步。

任務管理

•	建立和管理任務
•	為任務添加備註和截止日期
•	使用標籤和篩選器組織任務
•	從其他應用程式貼上任務清單

計時器控制

•	開始、暫停或跳過間隔
•	自動開始下一個間隔（可選）
•	規劃完成任務所需的間隔並追蹤準確性
•	管理已完成的間隔

計時器自訂

•	設定工作時段、短暫休息和長時間休息的持續時間
•	定義長時間休息前的間隔數量
•	設定每日完成間隔的目標
•	為各個任務分配不同的計時器設定

報告

•	查看詳細報告以監控您的進度
•	將資料匯出為 CSV 格式

聲音與通知

•	可調整頻率的碼錶滴答聲
•	多種鬧鐘聲音
•	互動式通知
•	可調整的鬧鐘和碼錶音量

整合

•	在所有裝置間同步（iPhone、iPad、Mac）*
•	與 Focus Matrix 整合，使用緊急/重要原則管理任務 **
•	與「快捷指令」App 整合，以自動化工作流程

快速存取

•	鎖定畫面和主畫面的小工具
•	鎖定畫面和動態島的即時動態
•	可從鎖定畫面、控制中心或動作按鈕啟動或停止計時器

自動化

•	與「快捷指令」App 整合（透過「快捷指令」App 控制任務和計時器）
•	在 Be Focused App 中基於事件自動執行「快捷指令」

裝置支援

•	支援 Apple Watch
•	也適用於 Mac
•	支援深色和淺色模式

* 與 Mac 同步需要另外購買 Be Focused Pro for macOS。
** 與 Focus Matrix 的整合需要購買 Focus Matrix 的專業版。
hk.trackCensoredName: Be Focused Pro – 專工作學習番茄計時器

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的性愛或裸露內容
hk.releaseNotes:
- 歌曲包「Tanchiky 精選輯」現正推出
- 歌曲包「NOISZ SL + PK GODHAND 合作」現正推出
- 復刻活動限時開啟，歌曲「Flashdance」、駕駛員「荷珀+伊洛 -Re：End-」以及限定頭像等眾多獎勵。
- 新增1首基礎歌曲「Sakura rain」
- 允許放大明信片後拖動
- 修復了一些 bug
hk.description:
《旋轉音律》是一款活用了手機陀螺儀功能的體感音樂遊戲。力求帶來前所未有的嶄新音樂遊戲體驗。 旋轉手機，感受在星河間穿梭的快感。帶上耳機，共赴鼓點與星光相伴宇宙之旅。

 =用體感，玩音樂= 
不同於傳統音遊的點按式判定，在《旋轉音律》中，你需要通過快速旋轉手機來完成部分音符的判定——就像駕駛賽車穿越急彎那樣。這將會是如同街機般爽快的音樂遊戲體驗。

 =風格多變的音樂曲目= 
眾多音遊知名曲師參與供稿並提供獨家曲目！電音、JPOP、西方歌劇、韓文流行、重金搖滾，風格多樣不單調。更有豐富新曲目定期加入遊戲曲庫。

 =夢與約定之地，愛與成長之旅= 
跟隨伊洛踏上宇宙之旅，追尋友人的足跡，邂逅不同星球的居民，拯救阿古亞星的命運。一路見證伊洛的成長吧！


※因遊戲內容涉及「性」-遊戲角色穿著凸顯性特徵之服飾或裝扮但不涉及性暗示，依遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為「輔導十二歲級」。
※問題回饋：rotaeno@xd.com

hk.releaseNotes: ・修復了戰鬥中與聲音穩定性相關的問題。
hk.description:
稀有物品！ 轉職！ 以及宏大的故事。
極致成就要素滿滿的正統砍殺類RPG遊戲“Knight & Dragon”第三彈！

《Knight & Dragon III》是基於中世紀奇幻世界觀構建的砍殺類RPG遊戲的第三彈。

故事始於某天早晨，你從突然到訪的老紳士那裏收到了正式公會成員證書，前往格林加爾德共和國的小村莊赴任。 共和國中發生的各種事件、與鄰國林達爾帝國的紛爭、騎士與龍的故事，最終都將成為圍繞星辰的宏大命運旋渦，將你卷入其中。

【Knight & Dragon III的特點】
▽沿襲前作的極致成就型RPG的基本係統，如白熱化的實時戰鬥、稀有物品掉落和轉職等！
▽實時戰鬥的互動性更強，可以判斷對手的攻擊時機，進行閃避、格擋、反擊等！
▽新增了豐富的武器類物品，如斧頭、長槍、戟等！ 還可以創建自己喜歡的角色，如雙手持武器或二刀流等！
▽新增的世界地圖為宏大的故事增添色彩！ 故事篇幅超越前作，同時保留了通關後內容！
▽此外，在本作中，通過各具特點的豐富NPC登場，以及地名、街市名稱等專有名詞，描繪了宏大的故事！
▽另外，遊戲當然也延續了前作中備受好評的功能，如隊伍派遣、人格面具功能等！

・・・

如您想在購買前體驗遊戲氛圍，前作《ナイト・アンド・ドラゴン：王国の騎士》可以免費遊玩，請務必試玩一下。

官方網站
http://dgjam.com/knightdragon3

Gerçekler karanlıkta kalmaz…
İstanbul’un sokakları, tarihi yapıları ve karanlık sırları arasında geçen bu dedektiflik bulmacasında, her bölüm yeni bir vakayı çözmek için seni bekliyor.

Delil Zinciri, bölüm bölüm ilerleyen, şüphelileri sorguladığın ve kanıtları bir araya getirerek gizemi çözdüğün sürükleyici bir dedektiflik oyunudur. Oyunun kalbinde kart temelli sorgulama sistemi bulunuyor:

Tanıkları çapraz sorguya al,
Arşivleri tarayarak bilgi topla,
Özel araçlar ile izleri bul,
Şüphelilerin tutarsız ifadelerini ortaya çıkar!
Her bölüm İstanbul’un farklı bir semtinde geçiyor: Galata’nın dar sokaklarından, Kadıköy’deki eski bir sahaf dükkanına kadar birçok farklı ve gizemli mekânda, yeni ipuçları seni bekliyor...

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
偶爾/輕度的現實生活暴力
偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
hk.description:
多年前，一艘神秘的船隻悄悄將珍貴的貨物走私到異國。 
《FRAMED》系列作的獨立篇章。
改變順序，扭轉結局。

《FRAMED 2》是一款黑色調益智遊戲，玩家可以調動播放動畫的漫畫格子順序，改變故事結局。

《FRAMED》是小島秀夫心目中的 2014 年最佳遊戲，而續作《FRAMED 2》的場景則回到第一代遊戲事件發生之前。

《FRAMED 2》專為 iPhone、iPad 和 iPod Touch iOS 9.0 以上版本設計。

已為 iPhone 5 以上和 iPad Air 以上版本進行優化。

LoveShack Entertainment 為澳洲的獨立遊戲開發商。
www.loveshackentertainment.com 歡迎追蹤 @LoveShackers，別錯過更新消息和新遊戲快訊。

玩法简介
翻牌收集表情鸡：翻开卡牌，收集各种造型夸张、情绪爆棚的尖叫鸡表情包！
趣味合成升级：3只相同表情的尖叫鸡就能合成新等级，外形更可爱，尖叫声也更魔性！
技能卡反转战局：使用搞怪技能卡，比如“群体尖叫”“强制合成”“鸡飞狗跳”，让战局瞬间翻盘！

mo.trackCensoredName: Be Focused Pro – 專工作學習番茄計時器
mo.trackName: Be Focused Pro – 專工作學習番茄計時器
mo.releaseNotes:
• Start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button
• Integrate with the Shortcuts app to automate workflow (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app)
• Trigger Shortcuts automatically on specific events in Be Focused
• Multiple fixes and improvements
mo.description:
專注於任務對於我們這個綁定於螢幕的世代來說是一項真正的挑戰。Be Focused 透過將單個任務分解為不同的時間間隔，並由短暫的休息時間分隔，協助您完成工作。這是一種令人驚訝的有效方法，可保持動力和專注。建立任務、配置休息時間，並在一天、一週或自訂期間內追蹤您的進度。您可以在 iPhone、iPad 或 Mac 上使用 Be Focused — 所有內容都能完美同步。

任務管理

•	建立和管理任務
•	為任務添加備註和截止日期
•	使用標籤和篩選器組織任務
•	從其他應用程式貼上任務清單

計時器控制

•	開始、暫停或跳過間隔
•	自動開始下一個間隔（可選）
•	規劃完成任務所需的間隔並追蹤準確性
•	管理已完成的間隔

計時器自訂

•	設定工作時段、短暫休息和長時間休息的持續時間
•	定義長時間休息前的間隔數量
•	設定每日完成間隔的目標
•	為各個任務分配不同的計時器設定

報告

•	查看詳細報告以監控您的進度
•	將資料匯出為 CSV 格式

聲音與通知

•	可調整頻率的碼錶滴答聲
•	多種鬧鐘聲音
•	互動式通知
•	可調整的鬧鐘和碼錶音量

整合

•	在所有裝置間同步（iPhone、iPad、Mac）*
•	與 Focus Matrix 整合，使用緊急/重要原則管理任務 **
•	與「快捷指令」App 整合，以自動化工作流程

快速存取

•	鎖定畫面和主畫面的小工具
•	鎖定畫面和動態島的即時動態
•	可從鎖定畫面、控制中心或動作按鈕啟動或停止計時器

自動化

•	與「快捷指令」App 整合（透過「快捷指令」App 控制任務和計時器）
•	在 Be Focused App 中基於事件自動執行「快捷指令」

裝置支援

•	支援 Apple Watch
•	也適用於 Mac
•	支援深色和淺色模式

* 與 Mac 同步需要另外購買 Be Focused Pro for macOS。
** 與 Focus Matrix 的整合需要購買 Focus Matrix 的專業版。

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的性愛或裸露內容
mo.releaseNotes:
- 歌曲包「Tanchiky 精選輯」現正推出
- 歌曲包「NOISZ SL + PK GODHAND 合作」現正推出
- 復刻活動限時開啟，歌曲「Flashdance」、駕駛員「荷珀+伊洛 -Re：End-」以及限定頭像等眾多獎勵。
- 新增1首基礎歌曲「Sakura rain」
- 允許放大明信片後拖動
- 修復了一些 bug
mo.description:
《旋轉音律》是一款活用了手機陀螺儀功能的體感音樂遊戲。力求帶來前所未有的嶄新音樂遊戲體驗。 旋轉手機，感受在星河間穿梭的快感。帶上耳機，共赴鼓點與星光相伴宇宙之旅。

 =用體感，玩音樂= 
不同於傳統音遊的點按式判定，在《旋轉音律》中，你需要通過快速旋轉手機來完成部分音符的判定——就像駕駛賽車穿越急彎那樣。這將會是如同街機般爽快的音樂遊戲體驗。

 =風格多變的音樂曲目= 
眾多音遊知名曲師參與供稿並提供獨家曲目！電音、JPOP、西方歌劇、韓文流行、重金搖滾，風格多樣不單調。更有豐富新曲目定期加入遊戲曲庫。

 =夢與約定之地，愛與成長之旅= 
跟隨伊洛踏上宇宙之旅，追尋友人的足跡，邂逅不同星球的居民，拯救阿古亞星的命運。一路見證伊洛的成長吧！


※因遊戲內容涉及「性」-遊戲角色穿著凸顯性特徵之服飾或裝扮但不涉及性暗示，依遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為「輔導十二歲級」。
※問題回饋：rotaeno@xd.com

mo.releaseNotes: ・修復了戰鬥中與聲音穩定性相關的問題。
mo.description:
稀有物品！ 轉職！ 以及宏大的故事。
極致成就要素滿滿的正統砍殺類RPG遊戲“Knight & Dragon”第三彈！

《Knight & Dragon III》是基於中世紀奇幻世界觀構建的砍殺類RPG遊戲的第三彈。

故事始於某天早晨，你從突然到訪的老紳士那裏收到了正式公會成員證書，前往格林加爾德共和國的小村莊赴任。 共和國中發生的各種事件、與鄰國林達爾帝國的紛爭、騎士與龍的故事，最終都將成為圍繞星辰的宏大命運旋渦，將你卷入其中。

【Knight & Dragon III的特點】
▽沿襲前作的極致成就型RPG的基本係統，如白熱化的實時戰鬥、稀有物品掉落和轉職等！
▽實時戰鬥的互動性更強，可以判斷對手的攻擊時機，進行閃避、格擋、反擊等！
▽新增了豐富的武器類物品，如斧頭、長槍、戟等！ 還可以創建自己喜歡的角色，如雙手持武器或二刀流等！
▽新增的世界地圖為宏大的故事增添色彩！ 故事篇幅超越前作，同時保留了通關後內容！
▽此外，在本作中，通過各具特點的豐富NPC登場，以及地名、街市名稱等專有名詞，描繪了宏大的故事！
▽另外，遊戲當然也延續了前作中備受好評的功能，如隊伍派遣、人格面具功能等！

・・・

如您想在購買前體驗遊戲氛圍，前作《ナイト・アンド・ドラゴン：王国の騎士》可以免費遊玩，請務必試玩一下。

官方網站
http://dgjam.com/knightdragon3

Gerçekler karanlıkta kalmaz…
İstanbul’un sokakları, tarihi yapıları ve karanlık sırları arasında geçen bu dedektiflik bulmacasında, her bölüm yeni bir vakayı çözmek için seni bekliyor.

Delil Zinciri, bölüm bölüm ilerleyen, şüphelileri sorguladığın ve kanıtları bir araya getirerek gizemi çözdüğün sürükleyici bir dedektiflik oyunudur. Oyunun kalbinde kart temelli sorgulama sistemi bulunuyor:

Tanıkları çapraz sorguya al,
Arşivleri tarayarak bilgi topla,
Özel araçlar ile izleri bul,
Şüphelilerin tutarsız ifadelerini ortaya çıkar!
Her bölüm İstanbul’un farklı bir semtinde geçiyor: Galata’nın dar sokaklarından, Kadıköy’deki eski bir sahaf dükkanına kadar birçok farklı ve gizemli mekânda, yeni ipuçları seni bekliyor...

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
偶爾/輕度的現實生活暴力
偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
mo.description:
多年前，一艘神秘的船隻悄悄將珍貴的貨物走私到異國。 
《FRAMED》系列作的獨立篇章。
改變順序，扭轉結局。

玩法简介
翻牌收集表情鸡：翻开卡牌，收集各种造型夸张、情绪爆棚的尖叫鸡表情包！
趣味合成升级：3只相同表情的尖叫鸡就能合成新等级，外形更可爱，尖叫声也更魔性！
技能卡反转战局：使用搞怪技能卡，比如“群体尖叫”“强制合成”“鸡飞狗跳”，让战局瞬间翻盘！

us.releaseNotes:
• Start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button
• Integrate with the Shortcuts app to automate workflow (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app)
• Trigger Shortcuts automatically on specific events in Be Focused
• Multiple fixes and improvements
us.description:
Staying on task seems is a real challenge for our screen-bound generation. The Be Focused lets you get things done by breaking up individual tasks among discrete intervals, separated by short breaks. It’s a surprisingly effective way to retain motivation and focus. Create tasks, configure breaks and track your progress throughout the day, week or custom period. Use Be Focused on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac — everything stays perfectly in sync.

Task Management

•	Create and manage tasks
•	Add notes and due dates to tasks
•	Organize tasks with tags and filters
•	Paste task lists from other apps

Timer Control

•	Start, pause, or skip intervals
•	Auto-start the next interval (optionally)
•	Plan intervals needed for task completion and track accuracy
•	Manage completed intervals

Timer Customization

•	Set durations for work sessions, short and long breaks
•	Define number of intervals before a long break
•	Set a daily goal for completed intervals 
•	Assign different timer settings to individual tasks

Reports

•	View detailed reports to monitor your progress
•	Export your data in CSV format

Sounds and Notifications

Integration

Quick Access

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Sexual Content and Nudity
us.releaseNotes:
- Original Song Pack "Endless Summer Rhapsody" now available
- Limited-Time Bounty Event is live! Join now to earn event song "Slide Down", new pilot "Mona", exclusive avatars, and more!
- The first event storyline "Midsummer Secret Adventure" makes a passionate debut.
- Brand new special pilots "Ilot - Midsummer Carnival" and "Hoppe - Leisurely Summer" are here to splash around with you ヽ( ° ▽°)ノ
- The song "Mirror" has been added to the basic songs.
- The song "Simulated feat. 澤村光彩 & Ichika Nito" is available for free for a limited time ヽ( ° ▽°)ノ
- The song "VECTOЯ" has been added to the Starseeker's Vault (unlocked at Starseeker Level 50).
- The rerun event is live for a limited time! Win the song "reveL," the pilot "Uncle Lime," exclusive avatars, and many more rewards.
- A brand-new results screen is now available, along with the addition of "Song Mode" and "Character Mode."
- We've introduced a brand-new standalone character screen, complete with zoom-in and zoom-out functionality.
- Players can now customize the game title screen.
- Improvements have been made to address lag issues during gameplay.
- We’ve fixed a ton of bugs.
us.description:
Rotaeno is a heart-pounding, thumb-tapping, wrist-flicking rhythm game that fully utilizes your device's gyroscope for an unprecedented musical experience.
Rotate your device to hit notes as you soar through the stars. Drop into your headphones and immerse yourself in the kick beats and stellar synths of this astronautical adventure!

=A Revolutionary Way to Experience Music=
What sets Rotaeno apart is all in the name - rotation! Building on the basic controls of more traditional rhythm games, Rotaeno includes notes that require smooth turns and rapid rotations to hit, making it feel like you're drifting in a highspeed interstellar stunt race. It's a real arcade experience - in the palm of your hand!

=Multi Genre Music and Beats=
Rotaeno is loaded with exclusive tracks from renowned rhythm game composers. From EDM to JPOP, KPOP to Opera, the stylistically diverse song collection contains a future favorite song for every music lover! More songs are already planned for future updates and will be released on a regular basis.

=A Journey to Find the Promised Land, Love, and Ourselves=
Follow Ilot, our heroine, on a cosmic journey through the stars, and witness her growth as she sets out on her own. Follow in the footsteps of a friend, meet locals on different planets, and save the future of Aquaria!

*Rotaeno will only function properly on devices that feature gyroscope or accelerometer support.
Concerns or feedback? Contact us: rotaeno@xd.com

us.releaseNotes:
In future updates: "Atheism" Archetype - and much more!
Don't miss out - Religion Inc. in the GameFirst Bundle and save on our other games by GameFirst!
Thank you for your awesome support and reviews!
us.description:
You are reading this text.
 But why?
 Are you looking for a game,
 or has the game found you?
 Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game.
 It is a simulation of creating a new reality.
 Will you shape faith,
 or will faith shape you?
 Humanity has always sought light in the darkness.
 It has always longed to believe in something greater,
 something that gives meaning to existence.
 That’s how religions were born –
 as beacons in the storms of history,
 as compasses in the ocean of life.
 What if you become the creator of a religion?
 What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality?
You are the Creator.
 You are the source.
 You are the inspiration.
 And if you are reading this text – you’re already in the game!
 All that’s left is to install – and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions!

 Become the source of faith – in the strategy simulator Religion Inc.

 Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness.

 There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity.

Game Features
*A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions!
*Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more!
*Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours!
*Hundreds of real-world religious aspects – and even more to come! Learn more about world religions!
*Unique active abilities for each archetype – perform miracles and change the world!
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy!

Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator – Religion Inc.

Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

us.releaseNotes: - Fixed an issue related to sound stability during battles.
us.description:
Rare Items! Class Change! And an epic story.
The third installment of the full-fledged hack-and-slash RPG "Knight and Dragon," packed with replayability!

"Knight and Dragon 3" is the third installment in the hack-and-slash RPG series set in a medieval fantasy world.

One morning, after receiving a certificate from an elderly gentleman, proving you as a full-fledged guild member, you are sent to a small village in the Republic of Gringard. This is where the story begins. Various incidents occurring in the Republic, the conflicts with the neighboring Lindahl Empire, and the story of knights and dragons will eventually involve you in a grand destiny revolving around the stars.

[Features of Knight and Dragon 3]
▽ The basic systems of a replayable RPG such as intense real-time battles, rare item drops, and class changes are inherited from the previous game!
▽ Real-time battles are now more interactive, allowing you to dodge, parry, and counter by reading the enemy’s attack timings!
▽ A variety of weapons like axes, spears, and halberds appear among the items! Additionally, you can create characters to your liking, including dual-wielding and two-handed weapons!
▽ A world map that enhances the epic story is introduced! The story, with even more volume than the previous game, and the end content are still going strong!
▽ Moreover, in this game, a diverse range of NPCs with unique characteristics, place names, city names, and other proper nouns depict the grand story!
▽ Other features such as party dispatch and the Persona function, which were well received in the previous game, are of course continued!

・・・

For those who want to get a feel for the game before purchasing, the previous game "Knight and Dragon" is completely free to enjoy, so please give it a try.

Official Homepage
http://dgjam.com/knightdragon3

Truths don't stay in the dark...
In this detective puzzle set among the streets, historical buildings, and dark secrets of Istanbul, each chapter awaits you to solve a new case.

Evidence Chain is a gripping detective game that progresses chapter by chapter, where you interrogate suspects and piece together evidence to solve the mystery. At the heart of the game is a card-based interrogation system:

Cross-examine witnesses,
Gather information by scouring archives,
Find traces with specialized tools,
Expose suspects' inconsistent statements!
Each chapter takes place in a different district of Istanbul: From the narrow streets of Galata to an old secondhand bookstore in Kadıköy, new clues await you in a variety of mysterious locations.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence
Infrequent/Mild Realistic Violence
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
us.releaseNotes: iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max hot fix
us.description:
Years ago, a mysterious ship smuggled precious cargo into an exotic land. 
A standalone entry in the FRAMED series.
Change the order, change the outcome.

FRAMED 2 is a noir puzzle game where you re-arrange panels of an animated comic book to change the outcome of the story.

Taking place before the events of the original game, FRAMED 2 is the follow up to Hideo Kojima's 2014 Game Of The Year, FRAMED.

FRAMED 2 is designed for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch iOS 9.0 and above.

Optimised for iPhone 5 and above & iPad Air and above.

Loveshack is an independent game developer based in Australia. 
www.loveshackentertainment.com Follow us @LoveShackers for news of updates & new games.

us.trackName: Speech to Text : Voice to Text
us.description:
Speech to text : Voice to text  is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. 

The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content.

Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words!

Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.)


Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today!



This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad :

・Longer Record time:
 -DICTATE CONTINUOUSLY up-to 1 HOUR.

・Unlimited save & edits

・Transcribed text can be edited directly.
・Ideal for both individual and group transcription
・Background support for voice recognition.
・On-device Speech Recognition.

• Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents.
• Share your text on social networks.
• Copy your text to other apps.
• Send your text as an email or text message.

• Create PDF instantly with single click.
• Convert text your notes, reports, letters into PDF instantly
• Text Analysis using AI.

►  Currently Supported Speech Recognition Languages: Arabic, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, Bokmål, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Shanghainese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese.

Technology:
New iOS 14 Speech framework having state of the art accuracy,
Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user

Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register

You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands.

Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ?

1. Reporters: Interviews, conversations and more are easily recorded and transcribed, preserving the original audio.

2. Writers: Novelists, Authors, can all write in their true voice, capturing their moments of inspiration anytime, anywhere.

3. Professionals: Doctors, lawyers, managers, etc. Easily transcribe your daily tasks, notes, conference calls, letters and more! Your voice makes it happen!

4. Elderly or Disabled: Eliminates slow typing, commonly misspelled words or embarrassing composition mistakes. This app makes it convenient and easy to send and share your words with those you love.

5. Language Students: Text analysis using AI , Easily learn and master new words and languages by practicing dictation with speech to text app !

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

We offer three auto-renewing subscription options:

$1.99 / month
$9.49 / 6 months - Save 20%
$14.49 / 1 year - Save 40%

The price corresponds to the same price segment , which are set in the “Apple App Store Matrix” for other currencies

You can cancel a subscription anytime by turning off auto renewal though your iTunes account settings.This must be done 24 hours before the end of subscription period to avoid being charged.
The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription.

Terms of Service :
https://voiceovermaker.com/termsofuse

Privacy Policy:
https://voiceovermaker.com/privacypolicy



Support:
Please email for any suggestions/feedback
voiceovermakerz@gmail.com
us.trackCensoredName: Speech to Text : Voice to Text

tr.releaseNotes:
• Start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button
• Integrate with the Shortcuts app to automate workflow (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app)
• Trigger Shortcuts automatically on specific events in Be Focused
• Multiple fixes and improvements
tr.description:
Staying on task seems is a real challenge for our screen-bound generation. The Be Focused lets you get things done by breaking up individual tasks among discrete intervals, separated by short breaks. It’s a surprisingly effective way to retain motivation and focus. Create tasks, configure breaks and track your progress throughout the day, week or custom period. Use Be Focused on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac — everything stays perfectly in sync.

Task Management

•	Create and manage tasks
•	Add notes and due dates to tasks
•	Organize tasks with tags and filters
•	Paste task lists from other apps

Timer Control

•	Start, pause, or skip intervals
•	Auto-start the next interval (optionally)
•	Plan intervals needed for task completion and track accuracy
•	Manage completed intervals

Timer Customization

•	Set durations for work sessions, short and long breaks
•	Define number of intervals before a long break
•	Set a daily goal for completed intervals 
•	Assign different timer settings to individual tasks

Reports

•	View detailed reports to monitor your progress
•	Export your data in CSV format

Sounds and Notifications

•	Chronometer ticking sound with adjustable frequency
•	Variety of alarm sounds
•	Interactive notifications
•	Adjustable volume for alarms and chronometer

Integration

•	Sync across all your devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac) *
•	Integration with Focus Matrix to manage tasks using urgent/important principle **
•	Integration with Shortcuts app to automate workflow

Quick Access

•	Widgets for Lock Screen and Home Screen
•	Live activities for Lock Screen and Dynamic Island
•	Control to start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button

Automation

•	Integration with Shortcuts app (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app)
•	Automate Shortcuts execution on events in Be Focused app

Device Support

•	Apple Watch support
•	Also available for Mac
•	Dark and Light mode support

* Sync with Mac requires Be Focused Pro for macOS, sold separately.
** Integration with Focus Matrix requires the Pro version of Focus Matrix, sold separately.
